column3: [[1986]]) was an American author and professor. Kilby was the founder of the Marion E. Wade Center
column4: and an influential scholar in [[Inklings|Inkling]] studies. In his honour
column5: the Clyde S. Kilby Award for Inkling Studies was issued (one notable winner is [[Colin Duriez]])
column6: and also the Clyde S. Kilby Reasearch Grant ([[Diana Pavlac Glyer]] is a recipient).
